name: Boricua Slots
description:
Try your luck and play with the only Boricua-style slot machine, if you are from Puero Rico or the world and you play the slots this is yours !, you will remember the typical Puerto Rican things like the coquí, four Puertorican, güiro , Maracas, tambourines, etc. Incredible graphics and sounds from real slot machines.

Check out our other apps and our new mobile apps and tablets in the more app button!

Boricua Slots does not offer gambling games with real money or opportunities to earn real money. Its purpose is exclusively entertainment.
